img.title: Several Community Members read to our students across the district during "Read Across America" Week. Thanks to Judge White, Donnie Jones, Kelsley Wilkerson, Bobby Downs, and Supt. John Siler for taking time to read to these students!
Superintendent Siler participates in Read Across America!

span.strong: Students and community members can anonymously report bullying, cyber-bullying, violence, risky behavior, or other safety concerns to school personnel by clicking the logo above.

span.b: We love and miss our students & staff! Stay safe.
